displayName: Old Cave in Digo Forest 2 - South

parameters: \nc<Melania>I guess our rebellion wasn't meant to last...
\nc<Elven Man>We don't have to be enemies.
\nc<Arnold>Are you sure about that? I think we do, actually.
\!You see...in civilized society, we have laws. \!Stealing
\nc<Elven Man>...have you no shame? \!The artifact that we
'stole' was in fact an Elven artifact that the current
royal court took from us! \!How can we steal what is
\nc<Elven Woman>Gertad, it's no use. We simply cannot reason
with the likes of this new ruler and his baffoons.
\nc<Gertad>So be it, Melania. \!If it must come to killing in
order to protect the artifact then we'll do what we must...
\nc<Anatasha>It's really sad to see an Elven girl with them, too...
\nc<Arnold>Enough of this already. \!Hand over the artifact or
\nc<Melania>What must be done, will be done.
\nc<Anatasha>Wow....she's still alive. \!What do we do now?
\nc<Gertad>I'll dump the two in the river and take the
girl to that human village North of here. She should be
\nc<Melania>I hope you know what you're doing Gertad...
\nc<Gertad>Not everyone has to die, you know...
\nc<Melania>Hmpf. \!I see you're back to finish the job.
I told you this would happen Gertad...
\nc<Gertad>Wha-, I spared your life and you repay me with
\nc<Emily>You give us no choice. Mor'dein of Fel'garam
has sent us here to convince you to stop stealing from
their village and kidnapping children. The problems you
cause are too great to be ignored!
\nc<Nika>I am greatful that you showed me mercy. To be
honest I wish that could forget about that day entirely.
But if you're hurting people and stealing, kidnapping
then you leave me no choice.
\nc<Gertad>Melania, we're no match for them without
How amusing. Run if you'd like. I'm not going anywhere and
I care less what those human-lovers like Mor'dein think
\nc<Melania>If you want the pillaging to stop then tell
the royal court of Moldera to give the Wood Elves of Digo
Forest back our homelands and artifacts! You'll get
\nc<Nika>I am no longer a Conscript. I do not represent
the royal court. Only the people of Fel'garam.
\nc<Melania>Then there is hope for you yet...
\nc<Gertad>We have suffered a great loss two nights ago.
A crazed mage of the royal court sought retribution and
slaughtered many of us. There are only a handful of us
left. We will not be able to survive alone.
\nc<Melania>If you would ask Mor'dein to take us in,
we would gladly put down our arms. \!Since we don't have
the numbers to fight any more, we will try our best to
assimilate into the greater society of with these humans.
\nc<Nika>It is done. Mor'dein has accepted your offer.
\nc<Melania>So it is then. We leave immediately. \!But I
must warn you. If that crazy mage of the royal court finds
out that you have deserted, you'd better be prepared!
